item.title: Improvement days
item.description: Improvement day(s) is an event in which each team member is given a chance to use the day(s) in whichever way they want, well as long as itâ€™s something productive, where are not here for improving Tekken or Rocket League skills on the PlayStation. What we are about here is different things like learning something new, trying out a new library or tool and even hacking out a tiny proof of concept.
